overview: This very early horror short  fan film by Wim Vink, shot on 8mm on a very low budget, has lots of fog,  some zombies and bloody mayhem to offer, as most of his works do. It uses prominent music by Goblin, from other composers too and itÂ´s his only one that was made in original Dutch language. The idea of plot wafts around a book that may have the power to call up the flesh loving undead, inspired by "Evil Dead" and the work by George Romero.
title: Pandora
